Uses of Class
org.forgerock.opendj.rest2ldap.SimpleAttributeMapper

  • Packages that use SimpleAttributeMapper 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.opendj.rest2ldap
    APIs for implementing REST to LDAP gateways.

    • Uses of SimpleAttributeMapper in org.forgerock.opendj.rest2ldap

      Methods in org.forgerock.opendj.rest2ldap that return SimpleAttributeMapper 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SimpleAttributeMapper SimpleAttributeMapper.decoder(Function<ByteString,?,Void> f)
      Sets the decoder which will be used for converting LDAP attribute values to JSON values.
      SimpleAttributeMapper SimpleAttributeMapper.defaultJSONValue(Object defaultValue)
      Sets the default JSON value which should be substituted when the LDAP attribute is not found in the LDAP entry.
      SimpleAttributeMapper SimpleAttributeMapper.encoder(Function<Object,ByteString,Void> f)
      Sets the encoder which will be used for converting JSON values to LDAP attribute values.
      SimpleAttributeMapper SimpleAttributeMapper.isBinary()
      Indicates that JSON values are base 64 encodings of binary data.
      static SimpleAttributeMapper Rest2LDAP.simple(AttributeDescription attribute)
      Returns an attribute mapper which provides a simple mapping from a JSON value to a single LDAP attribute.
      static SimpleAttributeMapper Rest2LDAP.simple(String attribute)
      Returns an attribute mapper which provides a simple mapping from a JSON value to a single LDAP attribute.
